title: KHR_materials_emissive_strength glTF extension
description: glTF extension that adjusts the strength of emissive material properties.

emissiveStrength.description: The strength adjustment of the material emissive properties.
emissiveStrength.gltf_detailedDescription: The strength adjustment of the material emissive properties. If a physical value is needed, these are candela per square meter (cd/m^2). Otherwise, this is a percentage, and should be divided by 100.
